attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLGSYJVZT5l4A5kxGXx_description
attribs.current: The bone collective makes two claw attacks, or one claw and one bite attack, or one swarm attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLGSYJVZT5l4A5kxGXy_description
attribs.current: The target must make a DC 16 Constitution save or suffer the effects of Wyrmblood Venom

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLGSYJVZT5l4A5kxGXz_description
attribs.current: If the attack hits, the target must make a successful DC 15 Constitution save or suffer the effects of Wyrmblood Venom

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLGSYJWqOjyQlAPNKqc_description
attribs.current: If the attack hits, the target must make a successful DC 15 Constitution save or suffer the effects of Wyrmblood Venom

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLGSYJWqOjyQlAPNKqd_description
attribs.current: Bone collectives create a reddish liquid, which they smear on their fangs. The freakish red mouths on the tiny skeletons are disturbing, and the toxin is deadly. A bitten creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned and take 1d6 Charisma damage. A poisoned creature repeats the saving throw every four hours, taking another 1d6 Charisma damage for each failure, until it has made two consecutive successful saves or survived for 24 hours. If the creature survives, the effect ends and the creature can heal normally. Lost Charisma can be regained with a lesser restoration spell or comparable magic

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLGSYJWqOjyQlAPNKqe_description
attribs.current: All elements of a bone collective within 50 miles of their main body constantly communicate with each other. If one is aware of a particular danger, they all are. Any bone collective with at least 30 hit points forms a hive mind, giving it an Intelligence of 14. Below this hp threshold, it becomes mindless (Intelligence 0) and loses its innate spellcasting ability. At 0 hp, a few surviving sets of bones scatter, and must spend months to create a new collective.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLGSYJWqOjyQlAPNKqf_description
attribs.current: The bone collectives innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:  At will: chill touch3/day: animate dead (up to 5 skeletons or zombies)

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLGSYJWqOjyQlAPNKqg_description
attribs.current: A bone collective can act as a swarm (composed of smaller elements), or it can grant a single member (called an exarch) control, acting as a singular creature. Changing between forms takes one action. In its singular form, the collective cant occupy the same space as another creature, but it can perform sneak attacks and cast spells. In swarm form, the bone collective can occupy another creatures space and vice versa, and it can move through openings at least 1 foot square. It cant change to singular form while it occupies the same space as another creature. It uses its skills normally in either form.

attribs.name: npc_resistances
attribs.current: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons that arent silvered

attribs.name: npc_languages
attribs.current: Understands All Languages It Spoke In Life But Can't Speak

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLGSbBkSA6INzwP8A4b_description
attribs.current: The wight makes two longsword attacks or two longbow attacks. It can use its Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLGSbBkSA6INzwP8A4c_description
attribs.current: The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the wight's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The wight can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLGSbBkSA6INzwP8A4g_description
attribs.current: While in sunlight, the wight has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

attribs.name: npc_resistances
attribs.current: necrotic; Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing From Nonmagical Attacks That Aren't Silvered

attribs.name: npc_languages
attribs.current: The Languages It Knew In Life

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLeFsisx2-EP1LlZPN6_description
attribs.current: The devil makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its fork or two with its tail spines.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLeFsite1MLudpA8ZWJ_description
attribs.current: Magical darkness doesnt impede the devils darkvision.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLeFsiuGtr14AzUKC7h_description
attribs.current: The devil doesnt provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemys reach.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLeFsiuGtr14AzUKC7i_description
attribs.current: The devil has twelve tail spines. Used spines regrow by the time the devil finishes a long rest.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLeFsiuGtr14AzUKC7j_description
attribs.current: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

attribs.name: npc_resistances
attribs.current: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
